alert.note: Alert for Coastal Taylor; Inland Taylor (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 26 at 1:46PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN TAYLOR COUNTY THROUGH 215 PM EDT... At 146 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 19 miles northwest of Steinhatchee, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Fish Creek, Dekle Beach, Jug Island, Howell Place, Jack Lee Island, Keaton Beach, Bird Island, Blue Springs, Cedar Island, and Adams Beach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
